description:
*TestBase* gets you off to a flying start when unit testing projects with dependencies.

TestBase-Mvc adds a rich extensible set of fluent assertions for verifying Mvc ActionResults and for easy setup of ControllerContext & HttpContext for both Mvc and WebApi

TestBase.Shoulds
-------------------
ShouldbeViewResult(), ShouldHaveModel<TModel>(), ShouldHaveViewDataContaining(), ShouldBeRedirectToRouteResult(), ShouldHaveRouteValue(), etc.

TestBase
----------
Controller extensions: WithMvcHttpContext([Optional] requestUrl, [Optional] query, [Optional] appVirtualDir ), WithHttpHeader(), WithWebApiHttpContext(httpMethod,[Optional] requestUri)
releaseNotes: Version 1. Unpolished but in use for over a year

title: OncTestbase
